name: Hook and Smash
description:
Hook and Smash is a fun and addictive game which will have you destroying cities all across the world!

Fire your hook towards the monument in the middle and tear down the buildings to earn big money.

Upgrade your hook to be able to reach further and try and get to the monument in the center of the map and find gold buildings and landmarks to earn extra cash.

Hook and Smash features:
- Simple and fun gameplay
- Create chaos everywhere you go
- Colorful art
- Unlock new cities to take down
